question: I had a nosebleed while fasting
answer:
QUESTION
I swallowed some blood while I was fasting, did this invalidate my fast
ANSWER


Share:
The swallowing of blood invalidates the fast. You have to make qalhaa (make
up) for that fast.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
